name: Command prompt writing script to file then executes it
description:
Simulate DarkGate malware's second stage by writing a VBscript to disk directly from the command prompt then executing it.
    The script will execute 'whoami' then exit.

data.command: c:\windows\system32\cmd.exe /c cd /d #{script_path} & echo Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell"):Set objExec = objShell.Exec("whoami"):Set objExec = Nothing:Set objShell = Nothing > #{script_name}.vbs & #{script_name}.vbs

input_arguments.name: script_path
input_arguments.description: Path in which the script will be written.
